name: ndla-article-scripts
description: A collection of functions for making article content responsive (and interactive)

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
scripts.build:commonjs: $(cd ..; npm bin)/cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs $(cd ..; npm bin)/babel src --out-dir lib --ignore __tests__
scripts.build:es: $(cd ..; npm bin)/cross-env BABEL_ENV=es $(cd ..; npm bin)/babel src --out-dir es --ignore __tests__
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build

author: ndla@knowit.no
